snippet.title: Flowerpatch: Making a cannabis farming game that doesn't suck!
snippet.description:
Flowerpatch is the first massively multiplayer cannabis farming game to use crypto collectibles. The Nugbase team has been hard at work developing the  farming game of the future, where players own their digital flowers. Our game uses the Ethereum blockchain to track ownership of Flowers, the first Cannabis NFT.  Take a peek behind the scenes of our development process in late 2019 where we discuss how to make a cannabis game that not only "doesn't suck",  but revolutionizes the way the physical world interacts with the digital.

https://flowerpatch.app/

Follow our journey to make a cannabis game that doesn't suck on our social media. 

https://discord.gg/cbYygHE
https://www.reddit.com/r/flowerpatch/
https://www.instagram.com/flowerpatchgame/
https://twitter.com/flowerpatchgame

Flowerpatch is an adult game 18+ to play.
Partner dispensaries comply with all local laws must be 21+ to participate
